entities.name: vectorSearch
entities.description: A method for performing a vector search with additional SQL-like conditions.

entities.name: createChatCompletion
entities.description: A method for generating chat completions based on a vector search within a table.

entities.name: v_score
entities.description: A field reflecting the similarity score of each row to the search prompt in a vector search.

entities.name: SQL
entities.description: A domain-specific language used in programming and designed for managing data held in a relational database management system.

entities.name: stream
entities.description: An option in createChatCompletion method for retrieving results in a streamed fashion.

entities.name: handleStream
entities.description: A function used to process the stream of data chunks in createChatCompletion method.

entities.name: folderName
entities.description: An example of a folder path.

entities.name: fileName.json
entities.description: An example of a file name in a folder path.

entities.name: table
entities.description: A structured set of data held in a database, typically shown in tabular form.

entities.name: update
entities.description: A method to update table values in a database.

entities.name: delete
entities.description: A method to delete table values in a database.

relationships.description: vectorSearch method returns a v_score field.
createChatCompletion method is based on a vector search.
createChatCompletion method accepts stream as a parameter for result retrieval.
When using stream: true, the handleStream function processes the stream.
folderName contains fileName.json as an example of file path.
update method modifies values in a table.
delete method removes values from a table.
